statements: SELECT * FROM ProjectTasks;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM ProjectTasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name FROM ProjectTasks WHERE priority = 'High';
SELECT task_name, priority FROM ProjectTasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, dependency_id FROM ProjectTasks WHERE priority = 'Low' ORDER BY dependency_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProjectTasks WHERE priority = 'High';
SELECT task_name, priority FROM ProjectTasks WHERE dependency_id = 1 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM ProjectTasks WHERE priority = 'Medium' AND dependency_id IS NULL;
SELECT task_name FROM ProjectTasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY priority ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM ProjectTasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE priority < 5 AND due_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM task_dependencies WHERE task_id = 5;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE due_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks ORDER BY priority ASC, due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE priority BETWEEN 1 AND 5 AND task_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT t.task_name, td.dependent_task_id, tp.priority_name FROM tasks t JOIN task_dependencies td ON t.task_id = td.task_id JOIN task_priorities tp ON t.priority = tp.priority_value ORDER BY t.task_name ASC, tp.priority_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tasks;
SELECT task_name, start_date, status FROM Tasks ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, priority FROM Tasks WHERE priority > 3;
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT dependency_id, dependent_task_id, dependency_task_id FROM Dependencies;
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, start_date FROM Tasks WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT task_name, priority, status FROM Tasks WHERE priority > 2 ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, priority FROM Tasks JOIN Dependencies ON task_id = dependency_task_id;
SELECT task_name, priority, description FROM Tasks JOIN Priorities ON Tasks.priority = Priorities.priority_level;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, project_id, priority FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3;
SELECT project_name, project_id FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT task_name, dependency_id FROM tasks, dependencies WHERE tasks.task_id = dependencies.task_id;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY priority DESC;
SELECT tasks.task_name, projects.project_name FROM tasks JOIN projects ON tasks.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT task_name, priority, project_name FROM tasks JOIN projects ON tasks.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE priority > 3;
SELECT task_name, priority, priority_name FROM tasks JOIN priorities ON tasks.priority = priorities.priority_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name, description, status FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY task_id DESC;

SELECT task_assignees.assignee_name, tasks.task_name, task_due_dates.due_date FROM task_assignees INNER JOIN tasks ON task_assignees.task_id = tasks.task_id INNER JOIN task_due_dates ON task_due_dates.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT task_name, tag_name FROM tasks LEFT JOIN task_tags ON tasks.task_id = task_tags.task_id WHERE tag_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE priority > 5 ORDER BY task_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE status='completed';
SELECT t.task_name, a.assignee_name FROM tasks t JOIN task_assignees a ON t.task_id = a.task_id WHERE a.assignee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT t.task_name, td.dependent_task_id FROM tasks t JOIN task_dependencies td ON t.task_id = td.task_id WHERE td.dependency_id = 5;
SELECT t.task_name, tt.tag_name FROM tasks t JOIN task_tags tt ON t.task_id = tt.task_id WHERE tt.tag_name='important' ORDER BY tt.tag_name ASC;
